name: NowWaveRadio
0:
”Alexa, start Now Wave Radio.”
”Alexa, play Now Wave Radio.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: now wave radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: We're playing the sounds of yesteryear for today’s ear! Listen to music with familiar sounds from New Wave, Synth-Pop, Dark Wave, Synthwave, Goth and other genres! We showcase music from new and iconic bands along with shows, requests, contests, and more. Also, listen in on the web at NowWave.Radio & NowWave.TV
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
